info.name: Classic-Like TD 2.1
info.description:
A compact Classic-Like theme for Torrenday 2.1 AND 2.0
Uses Classic TD margin color and other greys.
Works with the Blue or Red themes. Dark theme does not work.
info.additionalInfo:
11/6/18
Resized icons back to mini size, removed extra padding between icon and name

5/13/18
Updated to remove 2.0 version icons from 2.1 page

4/15/18
Newest update fixes recent TD page modifications: 
Reduces padding in many locations
Removes rainbow strip under search bar. 
Removes Top of the Quarter and Top of the Year torrent links to reduce categories box. 
Modifies Clear new Tag to be a red link only: Removes button border and no hover color change
Centers Page numbers


Latest update fixes image sizes on 2.0 so it is usable. Not all 'classic'fication mods have been converted to 2.0. Still best to use 2.1 via User Settings.

Page width has been forced to 850px to fit smaller displays
Browse list uses smaller icons to minimize vertical scrolling
New torrents are red and the yellow New image has been replaced with red NEW tag as on classic
Related torrents have been removed from individual torrent pages
Small display issues on forums due to re-sizing are to be expected but do not interrupt use.
Display issues known on the donation and joke pages. Not likely to be fixed
